A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke Skywalker was my hero growing up.  I am a huge Star Wars fan for 40+ years.  I did not like this movie.  I agree with Mark Hamill: \"This is not my Luke Skywalker.\"  Disney made an ugly Star Wars movie\, and I've lost faith in them as stewards of the franchise.  I was excited for Rian Johnson's trilogy.  Now I'm not.  Ditto for Episode 9. I had quibbles with Force Awakens\, but it seems like JJ understood Star Wars.  What a disappointment.  I am still upset a week after seeing it.
